survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from members of co-working spaces to evaluate their satisfaction levels, identify areas for improvement, and understand their needs better.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall environment of the co-working space?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for better readability and consistency. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall environment of the co-working space?

questions.question_text: Which of the following amenities do you frequently use in the co-working space? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-selection to capture usage patterns accurately. Ensure options are clear and distinct.

script.question_text: Which of the following amenities do you frequently use in the co-working space? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this co-working space to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard NPS-like scale for consistency. Ensure the question is straightforward.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this co-working space to others?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your experience at the co-working space?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your experience at the co-working space?

questions.question_text: How often do you attend networking or community events organized by the co-working space?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to measure engagement levels. Keep options simple and clear.

script.question_text: How often do you attend networking or community events organized by the co-working space?
